mapper.update: update sys_menu set MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_IMG = #{menuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MENU_NEXT_ID = #{menuNextId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_REMARK = #{menuRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_IMG, MENU_TYPE, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NEXT_ID, MENU_URL, MENU_REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_menu where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_IMG, MENU_TYPE, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NEXT_ID, MENU_URL, MENU_REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_menu order by PARENT_MENU_ID asc,MENU_NEXT_ID asc

select sm.MENU_ID, sm.MENU_NAME, sm.MENU_IMG, sm.MENU_TYPE, sm.PARENT_MENU_ID, sm.MENU_NEXT_ID, sm.MENU_URL from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.MENU_ID = srm.MENU_ID where srm.ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by sm.PARENT_MENU_ID asc,sm.MENU_NEXT_ID asc

select sm.MENU_ID, sm.MENU_NAME, sm.MENU_IMG, sm.MENU_TYPE, sm.PARENT_MENU_ID, sm.MENU_NEXT_ID, sm.MENU_URL from sys_menu sm where sm.MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by sm.PARENT_MENU_ID asc,sm.MENU_NEXT_ID asc

select sm.MENU_ID, sm.MENU_NAME, sm.MENU_IMG, sm.MENU_TYPE, sm.PARENT_MENU_ID,sm.MENU_NEXT_ID, sm.MENU_NEXT_ID, sm.MENU_URL,sm.MENU_REMARK,sm2.MENU_NAME as parentMenuName from sys_menu sm left join sys_menu sm2 on sm.PARENT_MENU_ID = sm2.MENU_ID where sm.MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or sm.PARENT_MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by sm.PARENT_MENU_ID asc,sm.MENU_NEXT_ID asc
